system.description: Effect: 5 Treats are randomly scattered on standing surfaces in the range of this attack. A creature that ends their Activation on a square with a Treat heals 6 Ticks of HP, and that Treat disappears.

actions.name: Fiesta
actions.description: Effect: 5 Treats are randomly scattered on standing surfaces in the range of this move. A creature that ends their Activation on a square with a Treat heals 6 Ticks of HP, and that Treat disappears.
